statements: SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT employee_name, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedules WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT task_description FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name FROM employee_schedules
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time, task_description FROM employee_schedules WHERE start_time < '10:00:00'
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, schedule_date, task_description FROM employee_schedules WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '16:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees, MAX(end_time) AS latest_end_time FROM employee_schedules;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE shift_time = '09:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE shift_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.role, t.task_name FROM employees e JOIN tasks t ON e.employee_id = t.task_id WHERE e.role = 'Developer';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT task_id, task_description, deadline FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT schedule_id, date, shift_start, shift_end FROM schedules ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.name, t.task_description FROM employees e JOIN tasks t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, name, task_description, deadline FROM employees JOIN tasks ON employees.employee_id = tasks.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, s.date, s.shift_start, s.shift_end FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, e.name, e.position FROM tasks t JOIN employees e ON t.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE t.task_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, role FROM employees ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT id, name, role FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT e.name, s.date, s.start_time FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.id = s.employee_id;
SELECT t.task_description, s.date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM tasks t JOIN schedules s ON t.schedule_id = s.id WHERE t.completed = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT id, name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT e.id, e.name, s.date, t.task_description FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.id = s.employee_id JOIN tasks t ON s.id = t.schedule_id WHERE t.completed = FALSE;
SELECT d.name, COUNT(e.id) as total_employees FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id GROUP BY d.name;

SELECT DISTINCT e.name, t.task_description FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.id = s.employee_id JOIN tasks t ON s.id = t.schedule_id WHERE t.completed = FALSE ORDER BY e.name DESC, t.task_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT department, employee_name FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks ORDER BY priority DESC
SELECT schedule_id, employee_id, shift_id, task_id, date FROM schedules WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM shifts
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;

SELECT schedule_id,employee_name,shift_name,date FROM schedules INNER JOIN employees ON schedules.employee_id=employees.employee_id INNER JOIN shifts ON schedules.shift_id=shifts.shift_id ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name, s.shift_name, t.task_name FROM schedules AS sch INNER JOIN employees AS e ON sch.employee_id = e.employee_id INNER JOIN departments AS d ON e.department = d.department_name INNER JOIN shifts AS s ON sch.shift_id = s.shift_id INNER JOIN tasks AS t ON sch.task_id = t.task_id WHERE t.priority > 3;
SELECT employee_name, department, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employees);
